price: Sesungguhnya Kami telah mengutus seorang Rasul (Muhammad) kepada kamu, yang menjadi saksi terhadapmu, sebagaimana Kami telah mengutus seorang Rasul kepada Fir'aun.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُولٗا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ilaykum rasūlan shāhidan ʿalaykum kamā arsalnā ilā fir'ʿawna rasūlan
